justifications: "I will be more worried about the decrease in foreign direct investment (from) the U.K. into San Diego," he said.
Jay Thomas, executive vice president and chief financial officer of Cubic, said the company is not too worried because it mostly exports services rather than goods.
Cubic does about 20 percent of its business in the U.K.
"We run the subway, the fare collection part, and we train their army," Thomas said.
